frontmatter.title: Check all your software is up to date
frontmatter.description: Software updates often include vulnerability patches. By making sure all your software is up to date, you ensure that you arenâ€™t susceptible to any holes in your software's security. You can check all of your software at once using a program like SuMo. Try downloading SuMo Lite and use it to scan your computer. How many packages are outdated?
